Title: Teaching Logic as a tool
Body: MIME-Version: 1.0 Server: CERN/3.0 Date: Sunday, 24-Nov-96 21:25:11 GMT Content-Type: text/html Content-Length: 2105 Last-Modified: Thursday, 02-May-96 14:56:35 GMT Teaching Logic as a tool An introduction to teaching logic as a tool Logic is the glue that binds together methods of reasoning, in all domains.
